title: Module set_parameters
body_html:
🚀 Feature

It is useful to have a set_parameters other the get_parameter in https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/jit/script/module.h#L368.
See also #13245 (comment)

Motivation

There isn't a single API call to load/change all the parameters at once after torch::jit::load() like the_model.load_state_dict(torch.load(PATH))

Pitch

I want to have a single call after torch::jit::load() that could consume serialized parameters like the_model.load_state_dict(torch.load(PATH))

Alternatives

Set the parameters one by one with https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/jit/script/module.h#L347

Additional context

body:
## 🚀 Feature
<!-- A clear and concise description of the feature proposal -->
It is useful to have a set_parameters other the get_parameter in https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/jit/script/module.h#L368.
See also https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/13245#issuecomment-434235980

## Motivation
<!-- Please outline the motivation for the proposal. Is your feature request related to a problem? e.g., I'm always frustrated when [...]. If this is related to another GitHub issue, please link here too -->
There isn't a single API call to load/change all the parameters at once after torch::jit::load() like ```the_model.load_state_dict(torch.load(PATH))``` 
## Pitch
<!-- A clear and concise description of what you want to happen. -->
I want to have a single call after ```torch::jit::load()``` that could consume serialized parameters like ```the_model.load_state_dict(torch.load(PATH))``` 
## Alternatives
<!-- A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered, if any. -->
Set the parameters one by one with https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/jit/script/module.h#L347
## Additional context

<!-- Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here. -->
